name: FORGIVEN
description:
SYNOPSIS

FORGIVEN is an upcoming RPG game detailing the adventures of four kids
and the powers that arise with spiritual unity and focus. Set in a modern world, Rob and his friends face the forces of evil in both modern and ancient iterations alike: facing corrupt corporations, strange animals, and mysterious forces of evil. Will you be able to save the world from the downfall that the strange Monolyth Foundation attempts to bring into the world? Find out in the world of FORGIVEN!
